text: sometimes all it takes to sort of

and I'm making a delicious citrus and

that add a quarter cup fresh orange

minutes and you don't really want to do
it much longer or it will start cooking
the shrimp have a grill preheating on a

just go on your grill leave the marinade

now if you like your shrimp spicy like I
